article.title: Integrated Data Services Provides Budgeting Software
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Integrated Data Services Incorporated, El Segundo, California, was awarded a $10 million contract for the Comprehensive Cost and Requirements System, a financial program management software tool used by U.S. Air Force acquisition and sustainment organizations to accomplish planning and execution of program budgets. Electronic Systems Center, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
